redirectMessagePre: You will be redirected back to the course list in 5 seconds - press
courseSlugHelper: Make sure the slug is the same as the slug on the course settings
confirmationRemoveTranslation: Do you want to remove this translation?
confirmationRemoveVariant: Do you want to remove this course variant?
confirmationRemoveAlias: Do you want to remove this course alias?
validationValidLanguageCode: must have a valid language code
validationOneTranslation: cannot have more than one translation per language
validationTwoVariants: cannot have two variants with same slug
validationTwoAliases: cannot have two aliases with same course code
validationNumberRange: must be a number or a range
courseLanguageSelectTitle: Which language version do you want the course to be visible in?
courseStartDateLaterThanEndDate: Start date must be same or earlier than end date
courseTeacherNameRequired: You must provide the name of the teacher in charge of the course
courseTeacherEmailRequired: You must provide the e-mail of the teacher in charge of the course
courseEmailInvalid: Make sure the given e-mail address is correct
courseUpcomingActiveLink: Course link active on upcoming course
helpSlug: A slug is a unique identifier for a course, ie. elements-of-ai, ohpe.
helpStartPoint: "Start with these" tag for course in front page.
helpHasCertificate: Does the course have a certificate?
helpUpcomingActiveLink: By default, the upcoming courses in the front page have a disabled link to course page. Check this to enable.
helpOrder: This determines the order of the courses in front page lists outside of study modules. Better not to use small values, as it's not easy to insert new ones -- 100, 200, 300 etc. are good.
helpModuleOrder: This determines the order of the courses in front page study module lists.
helpExerciseCompletionsNeeded: How many exercise completions are needed to pass the course?
helpPointsNeeded: How many points are needed to pass the course?
helpAutomaticCompletions: Does the course have automatic completions?
helpCourseAutomaticCompletionsEligibleFo: If the course has automatic completions, are they eligible for ECTS?
cumulative_at_least_one_exercise: Cumulative at least one exercise submitted
